reviews.review: Very good game if you are into competitive and strategy type shooters.

Its a normal competitive game, it has all the things that competitive games have.
Skill based gameplay, toxic community, cheaters, noobs, pros, retards, all you could wish for.
(you might find normal players, the problem is that is rare as finding a shiny pokemon)
pro tip: dont play if u have anger issues, unless u want to spend extra stuff on what u ll end up breaking ;)
